name: Human Male NPC Generator
content:
#definition

@Compendium[better-rolltables.brt-story.B6oXhKONjSMBPmKB]{Human Male Names} AS {name}

[[14+4d6]] AS {age}

@Compendium[better-rolltables.brt-story.DWWhFdnbLyuydgNp]{NPC Physical Traits} AS {trait}

@Compendium[better-rolltables.brt-story.zIOBrxDOh7fCz2u2]{NPC Jobs} AS {job}

@Compendium[better-rolltables.brt-story.kVPnAOJHIRbfcvP6]{NPC Catchphrases} AS {catchphrase}

#story

{name} is a Human Male. {name} is {age} years old and {trait}

He is a {job}

#storyGM

{name} catchphrase is: {catchphrase}
